Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Pistons are huge favorites to win against the Charlotte Hornets
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaden Ivey broke his fibula in the 4th quarter against the Orlando Magic on January 2nd
Miles Bridges scored 31 points, including a 3-pointer with 2 seconds left to send the game into overtime
The Hornets are still missing key players like Tre Mann - out since late November - LaMelo Ball and Brandon Miller
Others: The Detroit Pistons are ninth seed in the East
The Hornets last won a game on December 8
Betting odds: Charlotte Hornets are 2.85 underdogs on Bet365
The game will be played at Little Caesars Arena, Detroit on 04.01.2025 at 03:00
